nodes.text: The Ryloth Road was a secret hyperspace route between the spice-producing world of Ryloth and the spice-smuggling world of Socorro. It was mostly used by the Desilijic and Besadii kajidics, though a few other Hutt clans also possessed its astrogation data.

The Ryloth Road began at Ryloth and ended at Socorro. It intersected the Corellian Run, the Corellian Skip Run, the Death Wind Corridor and the Old Corellian Run at Ryloth, and Llanic Spice Run at Socorro.
